Ah, the bee, always humming around, happily unaware of a world much more complex than just making honey in their hive...
If it pays attention, a witch will find such hives hanging from trees.
Those not wise enough to follow the Art say that simply

punching it will be enough to obtain honeycombs.
Of course, you, a dignified witch, would never do such thing, relying instead on your trusty $(l:tools/boline)boline$() to do the harvesting. You might get stung as those brutes, but at least you will have a garanteed honeycomb drop$(p)$(o)Bee puns really sting...
